item.title: 5.2.1 Introduction
item.description: ‚ùó Only vehicles fitted with fuel sensors have data. Fuel report to control fuel consumption details, avoid fraud, optimize costs for businesses as well as individual customers. üëâ More fuel sensors [here]

item.title: 5.2.2 Chart
item.description: Chart # If the user wants to see Chart Report: Choose Reports > Fuel > Chart. Search # Step 1 : Search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Number plate: Select a license plate you want to see the fuel chart report. Sensor: Select one of the vehicle’s fuel sensor names. Step 2 : Press Search to see the fuel chart.

item.title: 5.2.3 Changes
item.description: Fuel Change # If the user wants to see the Fuel Change Report: Choose Reports > Fuel > Change. Search # Step 1 : Search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time. Number plate : Select 1 or more license plates you want to see the Fuel Discharge report. Step 2 : Press Search.

item.title: 5.2.4 Fuel Estimate
item.description: Fuel consume (km) # To have the data displayed in Fuel Consumption Report (km), the user does the following in the following order: 1. Open advanced feature # First, the user must enter Consumption norm (litres/100km), do the following: Step 1 : Click on the item Map > Info on the device list box. Step 2 : A dialog box as shown above appears.

item.title: 5.2.5 Fuel Summary
item.description: Fuel summary # If the user wants to see the General Fuel Report: Choose Reports > Fuel > Summary. Search # Step 1 : Search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time. Number plate : Select 1 or more license plates you want to see the report. Step 2 : Press Search.

item.title: 5.2.6 Fuel Summary by Device
item.description: Fuel summary by device # If the user wants to see Fuel summary by device: Choose Reports > Fuel > Summary by device. Search # Step 1 : Search by the following criteria: Date: Select available or optional time. Number plate: Select 1 or more license plates you want to see the report. Step 2 : Press Search.
